mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT college FROM dept WHERE college IS NOT NULL ORDER BY college

select dept_id, dept_name from dept where 1=1
and college = #{college};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO registration ( registration_id, student_id, course_id, professor_id, registration_status, registration_create, registration_update ) VALUES ( #{registrationId}, #{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{professorId}, 'Pendinig', now(), now() )

INSERT INTO attendance ( attendance_id, course_id, student_id, attendance_late, attendance_absent, professor_id, attendance_remarks, created_date ) VALUES ( #{attendanceId}, #{courseId}, #{studentId}, 0, 0, #{professorId},
#{attendanceRemarks},
'',
now() )

INSERT INTO score ( score_id, student_id, course_id, professor_id, dept_id, score_mid, score_final, score_total, score_grade ) VALUES ( #{scoreId}, #{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{professorId}, #{deptId}, 0, 0, 0, '' )
mapper.select: select student_name, dept_id from student where student_id = #{studentId}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(score_id, 3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) AS max_number FROM score
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(attendance_id, 2) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) AS max_number FROM attendance
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(registration_id, 2) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) AS max_number FROM registration

SELECT r.registration_id, c.credit_category, c.course_id, c.course_name, c.course_score, p.professor_name, ct.course_time_loc, CONCAT(ct.course_time_yoil, '/ ', ct.course_time_start, ' - ', ct.course_time_end) as time_slot FROM registration r, course c, professor p, course_time ct WHERE r.student_id = #{studentId} AND r.course_id = c.course_id AND c.professor_id = p.professor_id and c.course_id = ct.course_id

SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, p.professor_name, ct.course_time_yoil, ct.course_time_start, ct.course_time_end, ct.course_time_loc FROM course_time ct, professor p, course c, attendance a, student s WHERE s.student_id = #{studentId} AND s.student_id = a.student_id AND a.course_id = ct.course_id AND ct.course_id = c.course_id AND ct.professor_id = p.professor_id
